Package org.projet.model.gameengine

Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.projet.model.gameengine.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourcesManager, ShopBuyer
public final class Player extends Object implements ShopBuyer
The player (which is a shop buyer, which is a resource manager) and has a stock of resources
